import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search custom field types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves custom field types with optional request body filtering. This endpoint provides more flexibility than the GET version by supporting structured request body filters.

**Prerequisites**: None. Provide filter criteria in the request body.

**Workflow Example**:
1. To get all custom field types: POST with empty body or `{}`
2. To filter by scope: POST with `{"SiteScope": "Aggregate", "HideHidden": true}`
3. Use the returned `CustomFieldTypeId` values for subsequent operations

**Minimal Required Fields**: None (empty request returns all accessible custom field types)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":100},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for retrieving custom field types with filtering options.","properties":{"SiteScope":{"type":"string","enum":["Aggregate","Site","Product","Global"],"description":"Scope for site visibility filtering","default":"Aggregate"},"ApplySiteVisibility":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, respects site-level visibility rules for custom field types","default":true},"AppIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Filter to custom field types associated with specific app identifiers"},"HideHidden":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, excludes custom field types marked as hidden","default":true},"HideReadOnly":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, excludes read-only custom field types","default":false},"CurrentProductOnly":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, only returns custom field types for the current product context","default":false},"CustomFieldTypeIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Filter to specific custom field type UUIDs"},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter to custom field types for a specific entity type (e.g., Assets, Tickets, Users)"}},"title":"GetCustomFieldTypesRequest"},"examples":{"allTypes":{"summary":"Get all custom field types","value":{}},"aggregateScope":{"summary":"Get types with aggregate site scope","value":{"SiteScope":"Aggregate","HideHidden":true}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
